-- 查询点赞记录和相关信息 -- 查询点赞记录和相关信息 SELECT t_agree.uid, t_user.avatar, t_user.username, t_agree.create_date, t_img_details.cover, t_img_details.id AS mid, null as content, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t_agree.create_date)*1000 AS time, CASE WHEN t_agree.type = 1 THEN 1 WHEN t_agree.type = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 2 END AS type FROM t_agree INNER JOIN t_user ON t_agree.uid = t_user.id
LEFT JOIN t_img_details ON t_agree.agree_id = t_img_details.id WHERE t_agree.agree_uid = #{uid} AND t_agree.uid != #{uid} AND t_agree.type = 1
UNION ALL
-- 查询当前用户发布的图片被收藏的专辑信息 SELECT t_user.id AS uid, t_user.avatar, t_user.username, t_album_img_relation.create_date, t_img_details.cover, t_img_details.id AS mid, null as content, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t_album_img_relation.create_date)*1000 AS time, 2 AS type FROM t_img_details INNER JOIN t_album_img_relation ON t_img_details.id = t_album_img_relation.mid INNER JOIN t_album ON t_album_img_relation.aid = t_album.id INNER JOIN t_user ON t_album.uid = t_user.id WHERE t_img_details.user_id = #{uid} AND t_user.id != #{uid}
union ALL
SELECT t_agree.uid, t_user.avatar, t_user.username, t_agree.create_date, t_img_details.cover, t_img_details.id AS mid, t_comment.content, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t_agree.create_date)*1000 AS time, CASE WHEN t_agree.type = 1 THEN 1 WHEN t_agree.type = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 2 END AS type FROM t_agree INNER JOIN t_user ON t_agree.uid = t_user.id
LEFT JOIN (t_comment,t_img_details) ON t_agree.agree_id = t_comment.id AND t_comment.mid = t_img_details.id
WHERE t_agree.agree_uid = #{uid} AND t_agree.uid != #{uid} and t_agree.type=0
ORDER BY create_date DESC
LIMIT ${(page-1)*limit},${limit};
